Our strategy

Data determined by your work and attitude

Graphs that catch funder and public attention

Groundbreaking technology at non-profit prices

Trusted by

Our data is creative, loud, and accountable.

Creative

Combining on-site research and low code development platforms, we hand-make data experiences for people of all tech savvy.

Loud

Data unseen is data unused. Our interactive and colourful reports will get in the heads of your staff, managers, and funders.

Accountable

Our system prioritizes transparent data practices for every stakeholder. We're trained in OCAP principles and are happy to help create a PIPA/FOIP compliant data consent form.

We're committed to affordability.

We know that unallocated funds in non-profits are rare and we’re honored that you’d consider us. Here’s how we prioritize affordability:

Tiny overhead

Volunteering for office space and hosting our site on Github are just some of the ways we keep our monthly burn near zero.

Discounts

We’ve chosen Microsoft tech because of the hearty non-profit discounts they give. Licensing for a team of 15 can be less than $95 monthly.

Exact fit

With our app-based approach we build only what you need. That's easier for both of us.
